评论概述: Pretty, but a Bit "Old Lady" for My Taste
评论详情: The blouse itself is well-made and has a nice fit, but the style felt a little too "old lady" for me. The 3/4 sleeves and V-neck are flattering, but the overall look just didn't feel youthful or modern enough for what I was hoping for. It would probably be perfect for someone who likes a more classic, mature style.

I love cute blouses to go with jeans.  You know, ones you can be comfy in while also looking cute. This blouse is super cute and the sleeves are a great addition!  I have received so many compliments on it!  It can be worn tucked in or out because the bottom is made where it can be left out and look stylish.  I kind of wear it partially in on the front and out in the back.  The fabric is very comfy and not too hot.  I love this blouse!  Oh, it is also true to fit per their size chart.

This is a great top for work, date night, or just every day wear.  It is very comfortable and light for summer wear.  The inner shell prevents any transparency.  The color is beautiful, I get compliments every time I wear this.  It is very feminine and still professional.  Great to pair with a skirt for work or blue jeans out with friends.  Also, low maintenance, it is a wash and wear.  Couldn't ask for more!  Great piece for a flexible wardrobe.

This shirt is see through but you can put a nice tank underneath like I did. It's sparkly and spacious with a very comfortable flowing look.  I love it. It fits true to size. I'm a plus size. Can be dressed up nicely.

I wear a size XL and always welcome any clothing to help me hide the bulge. I ordered this blouse specifically to wear to a presentation I was giving at work. My coworkers loved it and told me I looked really nice - that meant so much considering I was already nervous about giving the presentation, etc. I already have a couple of the other colors on my Amazon Wishlist and can't wait to have this absolutely gorgeous blouse in a variety of colors. I absolutely LOVE IT!
Fit fine, but old-fashioned looking in person.  The color in the photo is true to the shirt, at least for the red one. My wife didn't care for it much.

评论概述: This is a beautiful top and comfortable to wear.
评论详情: I purchased this top for a wedding in Florida. The fabric was cool enough for the hot and humid weather we experienced. The wrinkles came out after being in my suitcase, without ironing. I am very pleased with this item!

This light and airy top is great for both summer and fall. The soft fabric feels comfortable and is suitable for casual outings or work environments. The sizing is accurate, and it looks exactly as pictured. I am also pleased with the overall quality.  The blouse drapes beautifully and doesn't wrinkle.

Got this for the wife to wear for work as she liked the color and style.Pros:  Item arrived well packaged with no obvious stains or tears.  She ordered the sparkly blue color in her normal size.  It's a true royal blue color, and my wife would say this runs true-to-size.  The gold shimmer is perfect in my wife's opinion, and gives this a dressier look.  The v-neck isn't too low, and is perfect for a necklace.  It's a stand-alone piece, and even though you could put this under a blazer or cardigan, my wife feels the sleeves are too pretty to cover.  They are sheer without being too sheer - but if you're a woman who doesn't like showing her arms, you could wear this layered without it being too bulky.  It's well made, and skims the body - definitely not too clingy.  It was machine washed in a laundry bag and hung to dry with no shrinkage.Cons:  None for this item.Overall, a great buy for the price point.  My wife would highly recommend.
Material is very good quality and true fit.
I bought this top to wear to a wedding.  It is very pretty and dressy. Nice material and well made.

Beautiful shirt, excellent quality and very comfortable.  The material is surprisingly soft but sturdy. Fit is nice and true to size. Color great and is accurate to the image as well. The shirt is great for dressing up, but looks great with a pair of jeans as well. Highly recommend.

This is an excellent top. I was originally worried when I saw that one of the layers was 100% polyester but the nylon outer layer covers any quality issues that the under layer may have. This top is soft and flows nicely. The size chart is accurate so it fits as expected. The outer layer doesn’t wrinkle easily, which was great since I had to travel with it folded up in a suitcase and had no issues at all. The look of the top itself is elegant and formal. I fit right in at a wedding and looked just as nicely dressed as everyone else there. I am very happy with this top and would absolutely recommend it to everyone.
The style and fit of this blouse is very nice. However the color purple is not the same as I expected. It is more of a dull greyish purple background. So disappointed!
I wore this cute and classy blouse with a skirt and received many compliments. It is as described and the size was right on. I Highly recommend for quality, and comfort.

I absolutely love this blouse! The design is elegant and perfect for both formal and casual occasions. The 3/4 bell sleeves and V-neck add a chic touch, and the double-layered fabric feels soft and comfortable. It’s easy to pair with anything from dress pants for work to jeans for a casual outing. The A-line silhouette is flattering and hides the belly well. It’s also wrinkle-resistant, making it easy to care for. Overall, a stylish and versatile addition to my wife’s wardrobe!

评论概述: Nice Shirt, A Little Shorter Than Expected
评论详情: This is a pretty top. It is great material and well-made. It isn't as light as I thought it would be, but I'm good with that.  I washed in cold on regular cycle and hung to dry. No shrinking at all.  The fit is as expected and a very comfortable wear. The undershirt part us heavy enough that there's no transparency. The sleeves are transparent.
Nice fit. Lightweight. I love it.

My mother love this Dress.The Lotusmile Women’s 3/4 Sleeve Dressy Top is a versatile and elegant addition to any wardrobe. Featuring a flattering V-neck design and 3/4 sleeves, it transitions seamlessly from casual workdays to evening parties. The sophisticated cut and quality fabric offer both style and comfort, making it suitable for various occasions. Whether dressing up or down, this blouse combines class and practicality, making it a great choice for a polished yet relaxed look.

This blouse far exceeded expectations from the second I took it out of the package. It is absolutely gorgeous and vibrant in color. The sleeves are so feminine and flowy. The fit is incredibly flattering, as is the beautiful flower design. The material is soft, comfortable, and does not wrinkle. This is definitely going to be one of my favorites, and I will wear it over and over again!

Just what I was looking for, a light weight and dressy blouse for the holidays in Florida temperatures. This pretty top fit true to size and is very comfortable. The red is more like a cranberry color, not too bright and not burgundy either, it’s perfect. I washed this in the washing machine in a lingerie bag to prevent snags in the lace, it air dried on a hanger in no time and no wrinkles. The sleeves are lovely and the length is just right. Very pleased with this order and highly recommend this top.

I recently tried out the Lotusmile Women's Floral Purple Dressy Blouse, and it's been the perfect addition to my summer wardrobe. The material is lightweight without looking too casual, making it versatile for work and casual wear. I've paired it with slacks for the office and with jeans for a more relaxed look around town.  The mesh fabric and v-neck design are balanced out by the built-in camisole lining and the collar cut, so I never feel exposed or inappropriate for work. The fit is true to American sizes, and although I ordered a large due to being pear-shaped, a medium would have probably fit fine. The longer side cut is also very flattering. Overall, I've been really pleased with this blouse—it's stylish, comfortable, and versatile.

My wife wanted the Medium Floral Purple. She likes the design, very comfortable, double layered so it's not see through. It's well put together with nice seams and is very reasonably priced. The shirt is machine washable and she air dries her shirts. She has gotten a lot of complements when she has worn it.
I ordered a Large and am generally a Size 10-12. It fits great! Love the sparkle. Great top to wear to a party and it will go with anything including jeans.

This is such a cute top, especially with the lace sleeves. It fits well, and looks great with jeans or slacks. The red color differs from the picture (it's more a true red than the darker look pictured) but it's beautiful. I get compliments each time I wear it!
You need this shirt. It’s stretchy, slinky, and comfortable. It runs true to size, maybe a smidge large. It’s curvy gal/big bust friendly and flatters my shape.

评论概述: Really pretty and very rich blue color
评论详情: This top is so attractive and looks really cute with jeans.  I wear it to work with jeans in a casual atmosphere.  The pattern is very pretty and the colors are rich and saturated.  It is lined with a mesh material overlay.  I ordered my regular size and it fits perfect.  The length is great as well.  This top is very easy to wear and it looks great.

The design and color is pretty. It matches the pictures and it looks very nice. The quality is great and I don't see any issues with it. I like it and find that it's comfortable to wear and is professional so it makes for a good office/business casual type shirt to wear for work. The size fits as expected and I don't have any complaints about it. Based on my experience with it so far, I'll be definitely wearing it pretty often.

This Is a very light  summery material that is transparent. but also very cool on the skin. It feels almost silky yet is not related at all. I'd say great for activitys like a club or  a hot day so long as bugs are not bad as it offers almost no protection from bites.There is a sewn in  slip as well that  goes  nearly the full  lenthth and begins mid chest.Sewing looks pretty normal nothing  super or bad just run of the mill. I found no flaws with it or  lose ends.  I like the pattern and color allot and I also give it a plus for having a decent variety of choices.its very versatile nearly a dress but also a tuckable shirt.I would like the slip too be sewn in a lil more so its easyer too put back on as it  can  get inside out easily. A minor critasism.All in all I really  do like it . I think there is  good value and  it fits as expected maybey  even a tad relaxed which is nice in this style. All in all it feels great  and I  enjoy it. I can say this is a good  choice.

This top is very cute.  It is also very comfortable.  It has a bit of stretch, which is more than I thought it would. I would say that it runs true to size.  I ordered my usual size and it fit great.  Can be worn with jeans, dress slacks or a skirt.  The ruffled bell sleeves makes the blouse.

This is a gorgeous and lightweight feeling shirt.  The bell sleeves are fun and flowy and the design (I got the purple flowers) looks just as pictured.  The length is also as pictured (I am 5'4") and is long enough to wear over pants or be tucked in.  The main section of the shirt has a solid material to keep your bra or torse from showing, while the sleeves are sheer.  4.5 Stars
